alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:08PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cheyenne, eastern Kimball and southeastern Banner Counties through NOON MDT... At 1107 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dix, or 7 miles east of Kimball, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Kimball, Potter, Dalton, Dix, Gurley, Colton, Brownson, Lorenzo, Kimball Airport and Sidney Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 18 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
